abilities.description: When you gift a blade you have forged to commemorate an important event or relationship, you may (one time only) reroll any dice when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.25421995c803340e]{Sojourn}, or Test Your Bond.

When you forge or repair an exquisite blade, roll +wits. On a strong hit, choose one to apply when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} with it.

  • Balanced: Add +1.
  • Honed: Inflict +1 harm on a bit
  • Named: Take +1 momentum on a hit

When you reforge a blade with nie iron to imbue it with mystic power, roll +wits. On a strong hit, choose one. A weak hit or miss ruins the blade. If you break or discard one of these blades, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (2 stress).

  • Baneful: Name a specific foe. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} with this blade against that foe, add +1. On a hit, inflict +1 harm and take +1 momentum
  • Arcane: The blade becomes a rarity.>/li
